paragraph.paragraph:
This chapter details the wizard and code generation. The wizard has seven different dialogs. The third dialog is different depending on whether the wizard have started from an Eiffel system, an IDL file, or a Type Library. Once the dialogs have been completed, the wizard generates a Type Library if needed, then analyzes the Type Library, and generates the code.
01_introduction_d.xml Introduction Dialog and MainWindow
02_generated_code_type_d.xml Generated Code TypeDialog
03_definition_file_d.xml Definition FileDialog
04_eiffel_project_file_d.xml Eiffel Project FileDialog
05_destination_folder_d.xml Destination FolderDialog
06_idl_marshalling_d.xml IDL Marshaling DefinitionDialog
07_type_lybrary_m_d.xml Type Library Marshaling Definition Dialog
08_final_d.xml Final Dialog
09_com_definition_file_processing.xml COM Definition File Processing
10_eiffel_project_processing.xml Eiffel ProjectProcessing
11_generated_files.xml Generated Files
12_class_hierarchy.xml Class Hierarchy
13_accessing_component.xml Accessing aComponent
14_building_component.xml Building a Component
